--read data

```{r}
energy_production <- read.csv('~/desktop/Data Challenge/Data Challenge/Data/Energy Production.csv')
ev_data <- read.csv('~/desktop/Data Challenge/Data Challenge/Data/EV Data - EV Data.csv')

```
# Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)
## Cleaning
**Netherlands**
###Netherlands_ev_data
```{r}
Netherlands_ev_data <- ev_data %>% 
  filter(region=="Netherlands") %>% 
  select(-category,-mode,-X,-unit)%>% 
  arrange(parameter,powertrain) %>% 
  rename("Country"="region")

Netherlands_ev_data_by_sale <- Netherlands_ev_data %>% 
  filter(parameter %in% c("EV sales", "EV stock"))

Netherlands_ev_data_by_share <- Netherlands_ev_data %>% 
  filter(parameter %in% c("EV stock share", "EV sales share")) # break down data by units (vehicles | percentage)

EV_sale_p1 <- Netherlands_ev_data_by_sale %>% filter(parameter == "EV sales") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = value, color = powertrain, group = powertrain)) +
  geom_line(size = 1) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  labs(title = "Netherlands' EV Sales by Year", x = "Year", y = "Sales (Units)", color = "Powertrain") +
  geom_text(data = Netherlands_ev_data_by_sale %>% filter(powertrain == "FCEV"), 
            aes(label = value), 
            vjust = -1.5, color = "red", size = 3.5)+
  theme_minimal()

EV_stock_p2 <- Netherlands_ev_data_by_sale %>% filter(parameter == "EV stock") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = value, color = powertrain, group = powertrain)) +
  geom_line(size = 1) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  labs(title = "Netherlands' EV Stocks by Year", x = "Year", y = "Stocks (Units)", color = "Powertrain") +
  geom_text(data = Netherlands_ev_data_by_sale %>% filter(powertrain == "FCEV"), 
            aes(label = value), 
            vjust = -1.5, color = "red", size = 3.5)+
  theme_minimal()

grid.arrange(EV_sale_p1, EV_stock_p2, nrow = 2)
```

### Netherlands_electricity_production
```{r}
Netherlands_electricity_production <- energy_production %>% 
  filter(Country=="Netherlands",Product=="Electricity") %>% 
  select(-X) %>% 
  rename("energy_production"="Value") %>%
  mutate(Time=case_when(
           str_detect(Time, '10') ~ 2010,
           str_detect(Time, '11') ~ 2011,
           str_detect(Time, '12') ~ 2012,
           str_detect(Time, '13') ~ 2013,
           str_detect(Time, '14') ~ 2014,
           str_detect(Time, '15') ~ 2015,
           str_detect(Time, '16') ~ 2016,
           str_detect(Time, '17') ~ 2017,
           str_detect(Time, '18') ~ 2018,
           str_detect(Time, '19') ~ 2019,
           str_detect(Time, '20') ~ 2020,
           str_detect(Time, '21') ~ 2021)) %>% 
  group_by(Time) %>% 
  summarize(Country = "Netherlands",Total_electricity_year = sum(energy_production),Unit = 'GWh') %>% 
  rename("year"="Time")

Netherlands_electricity_production %>% ggplot(aes(x = year, y = Total_electricity_year)) +
  geom_line(color = "lightseagreen", size = 1) +      
  geom_point(size = 2, color = "red") +     
  geom_text(aes(label = round(Total_electricity_year, 1)), vjust = -0.5, size = 3) +  
  labs(title = "Netherlands' Annual Energy Production (2010-2021)", 
       x = "Year", 
       y = "Energy Production (GWh)") +
  theme_minimal() 
  
```

### Netherlands_ev_chargers
```{r}
Netherlands_ev_chargers <- ev_chargers %>% 
  filter(region=="Netherlands") %>% 
  select(-category,-parameter,-unit,-mode,-...1) %>% 
  arrange(powertrain) %>% 
  rename("Country"="region")

Netherlands_ev_chargers %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = factor(year), y = value, fill = powertrain, group = powertrain)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +  # bar plot
  geom_point(aes(color = powertrain), size = 2) +
  geom_line()+
  labs(title = "Netherlands' Charging Stations by Powertrain (Slow vs Fast)",
       x = "Year",
       y = "Number of Charging Stations",
       fill = "Powertrain",
       color = "Powertrain") +
  theme_minimal()+
  geom_text(data = Netherlands_ev_chargers %>% filter(powertrain == "Publicly available fast"),
            aes(label = value), vjust = -0.5, color = "red", size = 4)
```

### Merge
```{r}
Netherlands_merged <-Netherlands_ev_data_by_sale %>% 
  left_join(Netherlands_ev_chargers,by=c("Country","year")) %>% 
  full_join(Netherlands_electricity_production,by=c("Country","year")) %>% 
  rename("# of EV"="value.x","# of charging station"="value.y","EV type"="powertrain.x","charging station type"="powertrain.y") %>% 
  filter(year %in% 2010:2021)
```

###Calculate the incluence metric
```{r}
Netherlands_metric <- Netherlands_merged %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  reframe(total_ev_sales_per_year = sum(`# of EV`),
            total_charging_points_per_year = sum(`# of charging station`) ) %>% 
  mutate(total_electricity_per_year = Netherlands_electricity_production$Total_electricity_year,
         influence_metric = total_electricity_per_year * total_ev_sales_per_year / total_charging_points_per_year)

write.csv(Netherlands_metric,"~/Desktop/Data Challenge/Data Challenge/CODE/Metrics/Netherlands_metric.csv",row.names = FALSE)
```

## Visualization
### EV Sales vs Charging Stations
```{r}
ggplot(filter(Netherlands_merged, `EV type` == "BEV" | `EV type` == "PHEV"), 
       aes(x = `# of charging station`, y = `# of EV`,color = `EV type`)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = T,color="orange") + # choose linear method temporarily
  labs(title = "EV Sales vs Charging Stations (Netherlands)", x = "Number of Charging Stations", y = "EV Sales") +
  theme_minimal()
```

## EV sales vs. Electricity Production
```{r}
ggplot(filter(Netherlands_merged, `EV type` == "BEV" | `EV type` == "PHEV"), 
       aes(x = Total_electricity_year, y = `# of EV`, color = `EV type`)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = TRUE, color = "seagreen2") +
  labs(title = "EV Sales vs Electricity Production (Netherlands)", 
       x = "Electricity Production (GWh)", 
       y = "EV Sales") +
  theme_minimal()
```
# Correlation Analysis
```{r}
cor_matrix <- cor(filter(Netherlands_merged, `EV type` == "BEV" | `EV type` == "PHEV") %>% select(`# of EV`, `# of charging station`, Total_electricity_year), use = "complete.obs")
print(cor_matrix)
```

# Regression Analysis
```{r}
model <- lm(`# of EV` ~ `# of charging station` + Total_electricity_year, data = filter(Netherlands_merged, `EV type` == "BEV" | `EV type` == "PHEV"))
summary(model)
```
